summary:
A small .xml for CBBE HDT that will let your girl character age during the game.
WIP
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][i]
[color=#ffff00][size=5]REMEMBER THIS IS A WORK IN PROGRESS
ANY IDEAS ARE WELCOME
READ MY Q AND A IN THE POSTS SECTION[/size][/color][/i][/b]

[u][color=#ffff00][size=3][b]WHAT YOU GET FOR NOW[/b][/size][/color][/u]
[color=#dd7e6b]A simple .xml preset for CBBE HDT[/color]

[b][u][color=#ffff00][size=3]INSTALLATION[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[color=#dd7e6b]Copy and paste it in the folder where your changes are written. Mine goes in :
MOD ORGANIZER ---> OVERWRITE ---> CALIENTE TOOLS ---> BOBYSLIDE ---> SLIDER PRESETS
Open bodyslide and batch build all your armor/clothes/body[/color]

[b][u][color=#ffff00][size=3]USING THE MOD[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[color=#dd7e6b]For now, the preset is usable like a normal preset for CBBE like you would any other presets.
Think of it as a preset that goes from[/color] [color=#ff0000][b]really slim[/b][/color][color=#dd7e6b] to[/color][color=#ff0000] [b]well in the flesh[/b].[/color]
[color=#dd7e6b]This means that NPC's will be affected by their WEIGHT SLIDER and not by their age.
[/color][color=#ff0000]You will get big and skinny old people and big and skinny young people like in real life.[/color]

[color=#dd7e6b]I hope you find that nothing has been too exagerated, I've worked hard to give it the most natural look possible.
I was charmed by the diversity it gave to NPC's
Don't wait untill I finish the mod for aging USE IT NOW ! :D[/color]


[u][color=#ffff00][size=3][b]WHAT I PLAN TO DO[/b][/size][/color][/u]
[color=#dd7e6b]Developp a script so that the aging will take place by itself as time pass. This will affect your character height, body, hair color and skin.
At this point I plan to make it work with your levelling so your level will reflect your age.

At lvl 1 you will look 12-13 years old.
As time pass untill you are 21 (level 21) your body will slowly grow.
After 21 a filter on your skin will be applied so every 10 years you will look more and more old.

A male counterpart of the mod is planed with beards lenght restrictions... But I will do the womans first.[/color]


[u][color=#ffff00][size=3][b]FOR THE SCREENSHOTS[/b][/size][/color][/u]
[color=#dd7e6b]I used the vanilla racemenu console command and manually changed face texture and hairs.
I've used "setscale 0.9" console command when the girl is younger growing up until she reaches 21 at "setscale 1"[/color]



[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=5][b]GOOD DAY TO ALL, HAVE FUN ![/b][/size][/color][/font][/center]
author: Hi_My_Name_Is_What
